title: WPF - SVG support
body:
SVG (scalable vector graphic) is becoming very prominent these days. All major browsers support it.
Performance and functionalities are improving very quickly.

comments.body: WPF still lacking support for SVG in 2016 is beyond ridiculous. SVG has been a standard for over 10 years now.
Good suggestion. I would love to see SVG and CSS support in WPF. Vector graphics and styling are the main weaknesses of WPF.

Please take a look a Batik for idea. http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/batik/
Very good library which is compliant with standard 1.1.
Would be nice to have something similar.
